page.title: 05INDUSTRY south of Waltham.
page.content: As with many rural areas, relatively unspoilt countryside has become the location for the administrative offices of a major industrial concern. Pedigree Petfoods (part of the Mars Group) the largest producer of pet food in the U.K. with 70% of the domestic market, has its National Office near Waltham Lodge. Recently extended, the new buildings have been designed to blend in with the countryside having been landscaped so as to be as inobtrusive as possible. Some of the local residents do not agree that this aim has been achieved. Close to the offices is the Animal Studies Centre, claimed by Pedigree Petfoods to be the world's formost authority on pet nutrition. Nutritional analysis, biochemistry, behavioural research and animal husbandry are studied here.
